hero.header: A secret sanctuary awaits you in the heart of the Sopron Wine Region

content.first: Welcome to our luxury log cabin, where intimacy and tranquility meet the beauty of nature.
content.second: With us, relaxation is uninterrupted, and unwinding is complete since the log cabin is located in a completely isolated environment. On the terrace, the endless rows of vines offer a perpetual panorama, while the grilling option promises culinary delights.
content.third: The proximity of nature fills you with energy, and if you want to cool down, the jacuzzi ensures complete relaxation.And of course, your dog can't be left at home! Everything here is dog-friendly, as they too can be part of this magical environment.Discover the comfort, silence, and harmony that our log cabin offers. We look forward to welcoming you!

service1.title: Amenities
service1.details: Enjoy Smart TV, Netflix, and Disney+ services. Climate control ensures a comfortable temperature and lightning-fast WiFi is also available.

service2.title: Facilities
service2.details: A terrace Jacuzzi and grilling facilities await you. A Nespresso coffee machine and complete kitchenware make your stay homey.

service3.title: Catering

service4.title: Recreational Activities
service4.details: Recommendations for local programs and hiking trails. In case of bad weather, exciting board games and local gastronomy tips.

q1.title: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept various payment methods for the convenience of our guests. These include the most popular card types such as Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, as well as electronic payment methods such as PayPal. If you prefer to pay in person, we also accept cash.

q2.title: Is there a cancellation fee if I can't use the reservation?
q2.answer: Cancellation fees depend on the number of days since the booking. Cancellation is free up to 30 days before arrival, from 1 to 29 days before arrival the cancellation fee is 50% of the booking fee, on the day of arrival or after, the fee is 100% of the booking fee.

q3.title: Is there a discount for staying longer?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide discounts for longer stays. If you stay longer than a week, we provide a 10% discount on the total fee. If you stay longer than a month with us, we provide a 15% discount.

q4.title: Do you deliver breakfast to the room?
q4.answer: Yes, our services include room service. Breakfast is usually delivered between 7:45 and 8:15 AM, but please notify us in advance if you have any food allergies.

q5.title: Do you accept pets?
q5.answer: Yes, we are a pet-friendly place and welcome small pets, but please note that we can only accommodate pets up to 15 kg. An additional fee of 7,000 HUF will be charged for cleaning and other expenses. Please inform us in advance if you are bringing a pet.
